titles.title: Hallelujah, I'm Walking With The King

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, I'm walking with the King,
Praise His holy Name, walking with the King.
Hallelujah, I'm walking with the King.
Every day, I'm walking with the King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The devil doesn't like it 'cause
I'm walking with the King,
Praise His holy Name, etc.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We're on our way to glory, etc.
We're going to be perfected, etc.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Aleluya, yo ando con el Rey,
Yo ando con el Rey, yo ando con el Rey.
Aleluya, yo ando con el Rey,
Cada dia, yo ando con el Rey.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: El diablo esta enojado por que ando con el Rey, etc.
